xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #set ($discard = $doc.use('Phones.PhonesClass')) #set ($discard = $services.localization.use('document', 'Phones.PhonesTranslations')) (% class="xform" %) ((( ; <label for="Phones.PhonesClass_0_name">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('name', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('name') ; <label for="Phones.PhonesClass_0_details">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('details', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('details') ; <label for="Phones.PhonesClass_0_hardware_cpu">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('hardware_cpu', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('hardware_cpu') ; <label for="Phones.PhonesClass_0_usb">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('usb', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('usb') ; <label for="Phones.PhonesClass_0_os">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('os', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('os') ; <label for="Phones.PhonesClass_0_os_version">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('os_version', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('os_version') ; <label for="Phones.PhonesClass_0_screen_resolution">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('screen_resolution', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('screen_resolution') ; <label for="Phones.PhonesClass_0_screen_size">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('screen_size', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('screen_size') ; <label for="Phones.PhonesClass_0_ram">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('ram', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('ram') ; <label for="Phones.PhonesClass_0_storage">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('storage', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('storage') ; <label for="Phones.PhonesClass_0_weight">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('weight', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('weight') ))) {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
